Abstract: The MYD14 version 6 product is produced daily in 5-minute temporal satellite increments (swaths).  The MYD14 product is used to generate all of the higher-level fire products, but can also be used to identify fires and other thermal anomalies, such as volcanoes.  Each swath of data is approximately 2030 kilometers along track (long), and 2300 kilometers across track (wide). The MYD14 product has attained stage 3 validation.

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FIREPIXELS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The number of pixels identified as fire within the granule

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GRANULENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The number of the granule for the day starting at midnight. Example: The granule from 00:00:00 to 00:00:05 will be granule number 1. The granule from 00:01:00 to 00:01:05 will be granule number 13

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority
